EmailTemplate.name: Final Guidelines for Product
EmailTemplate.subject: Final IMA & Guidelines for [Strategy] for {!Case.Account}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Purpose: To circulate Final IMA and guidelines for [Strategy] for {!Case.Account}.
[Enter description of request here]
See Sharepoint link below: [Add Link]
Below please find additional information regarding these new mandates:
Client: {!Case.Account} Client Type: {!Case.00NP0000000t4L3}
Next Steps: We will be reaching out for approvals shortly. Please provide these approvals at your earliest convince
Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
